subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Peter DeBoer took over a Devils team that missed the N.H.L. playoffs last season for the first time since 1996, and under his leadership, New Jersey is back in the postseason.
snippet: Peter DeBoer took over a Devils team that missed the N.H.L. playoffs last season for the first time since 1996, and under his leadership, New Jersey is back in the postseason.
